form_title.ms_form_title_llm_v1: UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE, Immigration and Naturalization Service, FILE# A-17 224 552

full_text: Screened by NARA, 7/10/2023 UNITED STATES DEPARTMENT OF JUSTICE Immigration and Naturalization Service 300 North Les Angeles Street Los Angeles, California 90012 FILE# A-17 224 552 DATE: March 26, 1968 Ir: BUSINESS OFFICE, LABORATORY AND RADIOLOGY DEPARTMENT OF HOSPITAL FROM ATTACHED LIST SUBJECT: PERFORMANCE OF X-RAY AND SEROLOGICAL STUDIES The bearer of this letter, Mrs. Bibi CHOUDHRY File# A-17 224 552 , whose photograph is hereto attached is an applicant for permanent residence. As part of his examination he must present to the United States Public Health Service the following laboratory reports; Report of a 14" X 17" chest x-ray, PA projection only. 2. Report of a screening serological test for syphilis. The above reports are to be returned to: U.S. PUBLIC HEALTH SERVICE OUTPATIENT CLINIC ATTN: ROBERT MAYLE, M.D., CHIEF OF MEDICINE 825 South Beacon Street San Pedro, California 97931 Tins original of this letter, bearing the alien's photograph, should he forwarded to the U.S. Public Health Service with the above reports Par ...i.dentification purposes. The duplicate may be retained for your records ir desired, ALL EXPENSES FOR THE ABOVE PROCEDURES MUST BE BORNE BY THE ALIEN AT THE TIME THE ABOVE STUDIES ARE PERFORMED, Think Today John L. Todd Assistant District Director Travel Control
